ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, it may be harder than you d think. Yahoo can get really screwy. I had the hardest time trying to unsub from a list bc yahoo didn t recognize me as a
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, it may be harder than you'd think. Yahoo can get really screwy. I
had the hardest time trying to unsub from a list bc yahoo didn't recognize
me as a member and yadda yadda yadda. Nevermind that I'd been a member for
years. And sometimes even if you do unsub, yahoo will not unsub you for up
to a week.
luv,
-Su

>
> for the love of god, how hard is ti for you totake yourself off?
> Tristen568@... wrote: Please take Tristen568@... off your e-mail
list! PLEASE!
